Posted By: A3Kitsune (1/13/2010 3:47:40 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This is a very good card. It works well in just about any life gain situation. Just one of these would cause your life to skyrocket fairly high and having 3-4 out is pretty devastating. If anyone were to make a life gain deck of any sort, a couple of these would really help out.

posts.post_content: Combos with EVERYTHING...I have a W/G lifegain deck with 4 oracle of nectars in it and I have 4 Boon Reflections in the deck along with Storm Herd and so many other crazy crap...I think the highest life I got was between 450-500...I also had...ahh...that artifact where you put a counter on permanents to make them indestructible...and my opponents were like 'stop! stop!'...
